NAME: tigName
LONG_DESC: Name of lead contig with variant

NAME: tigPos
LONG_DESC: Start position of variant in lead contig (BED coord.)

NAME: tigEnd
LONG_DESC: End position of variant in lead contig (BED coord.)

NAME: tigStrand
LONG_DESC: Orientation vs reference of lead contig

NAME: tigN
LONG_DESC: Number of contigs aligning over variant

NAME: tigAllName
LONG_DESC: Number of contigs aligning over variant and supporting the variant

NAME: tigAllPos
LONG_DESC: Comma-separated list of all contigs aligning over region

NAME: tigAllEnd
LONG_DESC: Comma-separated list of variant positions on contigs (start:end, BED coord.) matching order of listed contigs

NAME: hapSrc
LONG_DESC: List of haplotypes variant was found it

NAME: hapVar
LONG_DESC: List of lead variants in each haplotype

NAME: hapRo
LONG_DESC: Reciprocal overlap between variants in each haplotype.

NAME: hapOff
LONG_DESC: Offset distance between variants in each haplotype (min of start or end differences).

NAME: hapSzro
LONG_DESC: Size reciprocal overlap with the lead variant (h1 for HET)

NAME: hapCon
LONG_DESC: True if variant is in a contig-depth 1 region in both haplotypes.
